Pre-Game Insights: Otto Addo emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
Key Match Events: Jordan Ayew scored a late winner for Ghana in the 90th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Bernard Tekpetey identified Jordan Ayew's substitution as a turning point in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana has moved to second on the Group I table and is in a good position to qualify for the 2026 World Cup
